name: ViewFinder (BluebsTopCat)
description:
It's an ugly day out, why not go for a hike?

Viewfinder is a game about going for a walk in the woods and taking some photos, and maybe talking to some people to. Made at the UCLA game lab, The game serves as grounds for artistic experimentation with graphics, shading, and general ambiance. More of an experience then a game, really.

CONTROLS

================================

WASD / UDLR - Walk

Space - Jump

Shift - Run

Mouse - Look

Rclick - Camera

Lclick - Take Photo

E - talk, interact with car to leave

CREDITS

================================

Tyler Stephanich, Patrick Michael Ballard, Angela Washko, Eddo Stern, Jenna Caravello - Advice, Playtesting, and being generally awesome.

Dr. Rhazes Spell - Guidance, Setup, and Support.

Slow Arpeggio - music

Drelliot - oakland woods

newagesoup - soft gravel steps

Clearwavsound - crack knuckles

justkiddink - thud

tmrobin1 - car turn off

cmusounddesign - car on gravel

stradget - walk on forest road

Turbothesergal - car turn on
